anya-e0806n2:54_1: yadātviccādinā tu kiriyāva sabbenasabbaṁ na sūyati,
anya-e0806n2:54_2: tathā sati kuto ca kammattanti teheva vuttantī ca dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:54_4: māsamāsateccādīsu āsanādi āsanādīsu (potthake) kiriyānaṁ māsādiyogo viya kalyāṇittaguṇādiyogo ca lokassa patītipathamupayātīti,
anya-e0806n2:54_5: na sijjhatīti kiriyā na honti guṇadabbānīti kiriyāsambandhābhāvā kammattābhāvoti na sijjhati,
anya-e0806n2:54_7: Ajjhayanakiriyāya pabbatena ca māsakosānaṁ sākallena sambandhābhāvā accantasaṁyogābhāvoti māsassātiādīsu na dutiyā.
anya-e0806n2:54_8: Pubbaṇhe samayanti iminā pubbaṇhe samayoti sattamīāmādisamāsaṁ dasseti,
anya-e0806n2:54_9: accanta mevāti iminā samayassa sākallena viharaṇakiriyāya sambandhamāha,
anya-e0806n2:54_12: upasaṅkamanakiriyāyaccantameva yuttoti iminā nivāsanaviharaṇa kiriyāhipi pubbaṇhasamayādīnamaccantameva yuttataṁ upalakkheti,
anya-e0806n2:54_15: idha pana sattami yampattāyaṁ sattamyatthe bāhulakena “kamme dutiyā”cceva dutiyāppatti.
anya-e0806n2:55_7: Kārakamajjheti ettha chaṭṭhī samāso kārakasaddena ca sattikārakaṁ gahitanti (āha) ‘dvinnaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe’ti,
anya-e0806n2:55_8: abhinnassāpi hi ekassa devadattādikattuno bhinnānaṁ taṁsamavetānaṁ kattusattīnaṁ majjhe kāladdhānāni,
anya-e0806n2:55_15: isumhi āso asseti vā nipphannena issāsasaddena gammamānaṁ kiriyaṁ dasseti ‘isvasane’ti,
anya-e0806n2:55_20: muttasaṁsayenedaṁ samānanti mutto saṁsayo yasmiṁ avadhyādo tenetaṁ tulyanti attho.
anya-e0806n2:55_23: dvīhe bhuñjissatīti dvīsu divasesu gatesu bhuñjissatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:55_26: sakasakakārakavacanicchāyevāti hi idaṁ bāhullaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:55_27: dvīhā bhuñjissati kosā vijjhatīti dvīhā nikkhamma bhuñjissati,
anya-e0806n2:55_28: kosā nikkhamma ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhati upāttavisayo-
anya-e0806n2:55_30: kose vijjhatīti kose ṭhitaṁ lakkhaṁ vijjhatīti attho.
anya-e0806n2:57_0: Katacatthasamāsāti kato catthasamāso yesu te tathā vuttā,
anya-e0806n2:57_2: cattasamāse gatyādīnaṁ visuṁvisuṁ padhānattā tehi paraṁ payujjamāno atthasaddo gatyādīhi paccekamabhisambajjhatīti maññate,
anya-e0806n2:57_3: atha sutte ‘payojje’iccetāvatyuccamāne payojjo sayaṁ kattāti kathaṁ viññāyati yena ‘payojje kattarī’ti vivaraṇaṁ katamiccāsaṅkiyāha-
anya-e0806n2:57_6: takkiriyāsamatthovāti tassā gatyādikāya kiriyāya samattho eva niyujjateti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:57_9: Dutiyāya siddhāyāti vakkhamānanayena payojjassa kattuno kammattasiddhiyā “kamme dutiyā”ti sutteneva kamme dutiyāya siddhāya.
anya-e0806n2:57_15: payojjo kattā na kammaṁ tyabbhupagamma payojje kattarī’ti vivaritanti attho,
anya-e0806n2:57_18: niyujjamāno payojakabyāpārasaṅkhātāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamānattā kammabhūtova bhavatīti attho,
anya-e0806n2:57_20: tathāpi so payojakena gamanādīsu byāpāriyamāno payojakassa byāpāralakkhaṇāya kiriyāya sambandhīyamāno
anya-e0806n2:57_21: yadi kammaṁ na hoti aññathā kiṁ hotīti aññathānupapattilakkhaṇena sāmatthiyena kammabhūtova hotī”ti (attho)
anya-e0806n2:57_28: nanu vacanappayojanaṁ dassayatā vacanamevopadassiya pañho kātabbo,
anya-e0806n2:57_30: heṭṭhā vuttakkamena niyamatthattā vacanassa evakāro labbhati,
anya-e0806n2:57_31: sambandhivacanattā etasaddassa tena yathāpaṭhitā gatyādayova visessabhūtā saṅkhepena parāmasīyantīti
anya-e0806n2:57_32: ete samevāti katanti maññate evosañcāti maññate (potthake),
anya-e0806n2:57_34: nahotīti) iminā imamatthañca joteti “yadipi kiriyābhisambandhā payojjassa viya kattunopi kammattampasajjati,
anya-e0806n2:57_35: tathāpi payojjeti vuttattā kattari devadatte dutiyā nappasajjatī”ti,

anya-e0806n2:57_39: payojetīti asmiṁ uddese tadā kathaṁ bhavitabbanti sesoti yadācarahiccādivākyassāvasāne payojetīti asmiṁ
anya-e0806n2:57_40: uddese vacanasamīpe’tadā kathambhavitabba’nti pāṭhaseso hotīti attho veditabbo,
anya-e0806n2:57_43: yasmā dutiyā pappoti tasmā ‘yaññadattene’ti bhavitabbanti sambandho.
anya-e0806n2:59_1: sāpi tatiyāpi dutiyāpiti vattabba yadātviccādinā harati nāhāratthe naharatyatthe (potthake) tipi viññāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:62_0: “Vahissāniyantuke”ti gaṇasutte ayamettho “vahissadhātussa payojje kattari niyanturahite dutiyā na bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:62_1: niyantā sārathi kiriyāsiddhiṁ niyāmakoti vatvā tameva pakāsetumāha-
anya-e0806n2:62_4: niyametvāti ekasmiṁ karaṇīye kiriyā visaye patiṭṭhapetvā,
anya-e0806n2:62_5: vāhayati bhāraṁ devadattenetyatra hi devadatto paññavā puriso niyantāramantareneva bhāraṁ vahatītyaniyantuko kattā,
anya-e0806n2:62_6: vāhayati bhāraṁ balībadde iccatra tu balībaddā niyantā ramantarena na vahantīti saniyantukā.
anya-e0806n2:63_0: “Bhikkhissāhiṁsāya”nti gaṇasuttassāyamattho “bhakkhissāhiṁsatthassa payojje kattari dutiyā na bhavatī”ti,
anya-e0806n2:63_1: atha kathamettha hiṁsatthatā bhakkhissa hiṁsā hi cetanāvati sambhavati,
anya-e0806n2:63_10: padassetvā gantabbaṁ kinnāmāññadassanopagātādhirenāti tuṇhī hoti nikkāraṇissā nikkammissā (potthake) bhavato-
anya-e0806n2:63_12: paratthānubaddhakicchaṁ pana mahāpuññapaññā na kiñci viya maññanti,
anya-e0806n2:63_14: taṁtaṁ mataññuno vā kadāci karahaci yadidamavalokeyyuṁ te cetthāvatāraṁ cetthakāraṁ (potthake) labheyyuṁ
anya-e0806n2:63_15: etādiso ca paññavā paṭiladdhabuddhavacanappasādo’ti tadavatārena ca buddhe bhagavati kamena daḷhaṁ pasādaṁ
anya-e0806n2:63_17: evamevaṁ tattha tattha taṁtaṁbyākaraṇodāharaṇappasaṅgepi tadanusāreneva tantaṁpayojanaṁ veditabbaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:64_0: Duhādīnaṁ tyevamādo amhākamparamagurunā ratanamatipañcikālaṅkārādikārena nānākārasāratthavedaveditu vedāvedita
anya-e0806n2:64_12: tena kammadvayayuttānaṁ majjhe duhādīnamappadhānepi gavādo kamme tyādippabhutayoti yojanā.
anya-e0806n2:64_13: Iccāditiādisaddena ‘avarundhati vajaṁ gāvaṁ avarundhīyate vajaṁ go’iccādīnaṁ pariggaho,
anya-e0806n2:64_15: Gamīyate gāmo devadattanti ettha kathaṁ payojjattasambhavoti āha-
anya-e0806n2:64_17: yajjapi gāmo tuṇhī hoti nibyāpārattā purisova tu gamanakiriyaṁ nipphādeti,
anya-e0806n2:64_19: tamubhinnampi gāmapurisānaṁ samānanti purisa kiriyātulyaphalattā gāmopi gamanakiriyāya kattubyapadese kāraṇaṁ bhavatīti adhippāyo,
anya-e0806n2:64_20: tathāhi gāmaṁ gacchanto koci gāme āsanne sati vadati ‘āgato gāmo patto gāmo’ti,
anya-e0806n2:65_0: “Duhi yāci rudhi pucchi, bhikkhi ci bruvi sāsi ca;
anya-e0806n2:66_0: Ji daṇḍi patthi manthī ca, dhātū honti duhādayo.
anya-e0806n2:72_0: Payogo pana sambandhacintāyamiha ca vuttānusārena sabbathā viññeyyā.
anya-e0806n2:74_0: Pubbe kiriyānissayena kārakanissayena (potthake) dutiyāya vihitattā āha ‘idāni’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:74_1: dhisaddassa atthappadhāna niddesena vā ādisaddena vā ‘hā devadatta’ntipi hoti,
anya-e0806n2:74_2: hā devadattadukkhanti tu dukkhena yogā devadattena na yutto hotīti paṭhamāvāmantaṇe.
anya-e0806n2:74_3: Nanuca antarāsaddena yoge yathārājagahanālandāhi dutiyā (tathā) antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nā landa(nti
anya-e0806n2:74_4: tathā) antarāmaggeti ettha maggatopi antarāmaggatopi kasmā na dutiyāti tenāyogā,
anya-e0806n2:74_5: yesañhi taṁmajjhaṁ te tena yujjantīti tehiyeva dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:74_6: athavābbhupagatepi taṁyoge taṁsambandhīyeva maggoti mukhyattā tato sabbassa (potthake) na dutiyā,
anya-e0806n2:74_7: atrāpi chaṭṭhīyeva pappoti antarā tañca mañca kamaṇḍaluiti,
anya-e0806n2:74_9: atha kamaṇḍalusaddato dutiyā kasmā na bhavati satīpyantarena yoge tassa padhānattā,
anya-e0806n2:74_13: tatra kamaṇḍaluno sakatthe vattamānattā padhānattenāvatattā pāṭipadikato accutattā parattā paṭhameva bhavatīti jīnindabuddhinyāsa.
anya-e0806n2:74_14: Nindādi lakkhaṇassa sambandhassa sabbhāvā sabbattha sambandhachaṭṭhiyā sampattāyaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0806n2:76_0: Lakkhaṇādīsvatthesuti nāmassā kassā (potthake) yamatthaniddesoti āha ‘abhināyo yutto’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:77_0: Kriyāya jotako nāyaṁ, sambandhassa na vācako;
anya-e0806n2:79_0: Ayamettha attho “ayamabhi abhinandatityādīsu viya kiriyāya jotako na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:79_1: chaṭṭhī viya sambandhassa vācako na hoti,
anya-e0806n2:79_2: nikkosambītyatra gamanakiriyāpekkhī nisaddo viya nāpi kiriyantarā pekkhī,
anya-e0806n2:79_3: kiñcarahi sambandhassa tu bhedako visesako bhavatī”ti tamupadassetumāha-
anya-e0806n2:79_6: rukkhampatvā vijjotate itievaṁ pattikiriyāya patvātivuttarukkhapāpanakiriyāya janitoti attho,
anya-e0806n2:79_7: tathāhi rukkhassa vijjuyā pāpanābhāve vijjuyā lakkhiyāya tallaṇassa ca rukkhassa yo lakkhiyalakkhaṇabhāvo sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:79_9: nanu sambandhe abhinā jotīyamāne rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā kathaṁ jotīyatīti āha-
anya-e0806n2:79_16: devadattassa sādhuttasaṅkhātaitthampakārappattiyā visayabhāvenāvaṭṭhitā mātā tattha vattati nāmāti āha-
anya-e0806n2:79_18: mātā ca itthambhūte pavattā visaya bhāvena devadatto ca tattha visayībhāvena,
anya-e0806n2:79_19: tesañca visayavisayībhāvalakkhaṇo sambandho itthampattilakkhaṇāya kiriyāya jāto,
anya-e0806n2:79_21: socātinā jotīyatīti mātu tenābhinā yogoti āha-
anya-e0806n2:79_25: evaṁ maññate “kiñcāpi so sambandho devadattenāpyavinābhāvīti tassa sobhinā jotīyate,
anya-e0806n2:79_26: tathāpi mātusambandhobhinā jotīyatīti ‘mātu tena yogo’ti ca (vuccati)…
anya-e0806n2:79_27: saddasattiyā taggatāyeva dutiyāya ubhayagatassāpi sambandhassa jotanato”ti rukkho rukkho tiṭṭhatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:79_28: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti ṭhitinnissāya esaṁ rukkhānaṁ yo ca sambandhoti yojanā,
anya-e0806n2:79_29: rukkhānanti iminā rukkhā kiriyāya pare sambandhinoti ñāpeti,
anya-e0806n2:79_30: ṭhitimpaṭiccāti iminā pana tiṭṭhatisaddavacanīyā sādhyarūpā ṭhitikiriyā rukkhato pare sambandhīti,
anya-e0806n2:79_36: dvibbacaneneva jotanīyāti vicchātthe vuttimatte satīpi vibhattiyā vicchatthe vutkimattetyādivacanaṁ vicāreretabbaṁvitattiyā
anya-e0806n2:79_38: lakkhaṇitthambhūti hi pakativisesanaṁ jotetumasamatthattā vicchāya jotanāya dvibbavacanaṁ kattabbamevāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0806n2:83_2: hetuttā lakkhaṇattābhāve saccakiriyāya kathaṁ lakkhaṇe dutiyāti hetuttepi lakkhaṇattamassa sādhento sādhammapayogenānvayamāha-
anya-e0806n2:83_4: ettha hi lakkhaṇaṁ sacca kiriyāti paṭiññā,
anya-e0806n2:83_6: yaṁ sakimpi nimittatāya kappate tampi lakkhaṇaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0806n2:83_7: yathā’api bhavaṁ kamaṇḍalupāṇiṁ sissamaddakkhī’ti sādhammapayogenānvayo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0806n2:83_11: kadāci kenaci kamaṇḍalupāṇīsisso diṭṭho so tameva dassanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ katvā pucchati ‘api’tyādinā,
anya-e0806n2:83_12: atha yathā vuttena hetunopi lakkhaṇattamattu tathāpi paravippaṭisedhena hetumhi tatiyā kasmā na siyāti codayamāha ‘na nvevampi’ccādi,
anya-e0806n2:83_14: tathāhi chaṭṭhiyā pavādo hoti hetumhi tatiyāvidhi…
anya-e0806n2:85_0: Sahatthe-nuno vattane pabbatena yogo kathanti āha‘pabbatene’ccādi.
anya-e0806n2:87_4: kathaṁ tena yuttattaṁ ukkaṭṭhassāti hīnukkaṭṭhasambandhamukhena vibhāvento’tatthā’tiādimāha,

anya-e0806n2:89_3: athādhikīvinimutte adhikādhikisambandho kathamavasīyate nahyatrādhikī koci sūyaticcāha-

anya-e0806n2:91_18: Byatirekamāpādīyatīti kārakachakkato byatirittattā sambandho byatireko taṁ āpādīyati pāpīyatīti attho,

anya-e0806n2:93_5: karotīti ca iminā anvattha byapadesova siddho-

anya-e0806n2:95_0: Sā kattā nāmappayutto, payutto vātyayaṁ dvidhāti.
anya-e0806n2:96_3: yamabyavadhānena karaṇādhikaraṇe heva sādhyate kattārā tu dūraṭṭhena,
anya-e0806n2:96_4: tathāsati kathamanekasādhanasādhanīyaṁ kiriyaṁ kattāva karoti mukhyabhāvenāparetvamukhyabhāvenāti vuccate-
anya-e0806n2:97_2: pavivekeca kārakantharāmabhāvedissabhe kattarikriyā atthi bhavati vijjaticcādo titaṭīkā,
anya-e0806n2:99_0: Ayamettha attho “kattuno sakāsā aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ ubbhūtyā sambhavenaca,
anya-e0806n2:99_1: tathāhi pasiddhakaraṇasabhāvopi pharasu kattāyattavuttitāyādhikaraṇambha vati‘pharasumhi ṭhapetvā chindatī’ti,

anya-e0806n2:99_6: iminā kāraṇena dūrato upakārittepi kattuyeva sappadhānatā siyā”ti, punapi-

anya-e0806n2:102_4: na hi saddo bāhye vatthumhi byāpāramāpajjati, tathāhi–
anya-e0806n2:103_0: Aññathe vāggi saṁsaggā, dāhaṁ daḍḍhoti maññati;
anya-e0806n2:105_0: Bāhyapadatthassa sabhāvo viya hutvā micchābhyāsena anādinā pana pavattena bāhye vatthūni avijjamānena karaṇabhūtena thālyādīnaṁ kattuttaṁ hotī”ti.

anya-e0806n2:114_3: iminā idaṁ dīpeti “karaṇabyapadesāya suttantarābhāvepi karotyaneneti karaṇantyanvatthato pasiddho-
anya-e0806n2:117_4: pasiddhādhikaraṇānampi tadanuttādivisesasambhave thālyā pacatī’ti karaṇattassapi dassanato vacanicchātoyeva karaṇaṁ kārakaṁ viññeyya”nti,
anya-e0806n2:117_10: Pakati yābhirūpoccādo kiriyāyāvijjamānattā sambandhamattaṁ viññāyatīti sambandhalakkhaṇā chaṭṭhī siyā,

anya-e0806n2:117_14: pañcakenāti pañca parimāṇassa pañcako pañcakaṁ vaggaṁ katvā pasavo kiṇāti pañcapañca katvā kiṇātītyatthoti
anya-e0806n2:117_26: yaṁ yasmā aññagotto gotamo na hoti atoca gotamo bhavatīti sambandho,
anya-e0806n2:117_27: nanuca dvidoṇa pañcakā kayampaṭicca kammabhūtā honti dvidoṇādinā keyattā tato kimuccate‘kayampaṭicca dvidoṇapañcakā karaṇāni bhavantī’tyā saṅkīyāha-
anya-e0806n2:117_31: tehi pana dvidoṇādyatthaṁ mūlaṁ tādatthiyā bhihitanti na vuttadosāvasaro”ti.
anya-e0806n2:119_0: Yathākkamamāgamanakiriyāya thūlattaguṇena gomantadabbena ca sambandhaṁ dassetuṁ ‘taṁ yathe’ccādimāha,
anya-e0806n2:119_1: udāharaṇamattaṁ dassentopi iminā adhippāyenāpi dassetīti vuttaṁ ‘sabbattheva vā’tiādi,
